meanings.definition: Capable of being cut or divided easily
meanings.sent1: The sectile clay was perfect for the pottery class.
meanings.sent2: The sectile paper tore effortlessly along the dotted line.
meanings.sent3: The sectile cheese was so soft that it practically sliced itself!
meanings.sent4: Her sectile hair fell in delicate strands around her face.
meanings.sent5: The sectile fabric draped elegantly over the mannequin.

meanings.definition: Able to be shaped or molded easily
meanings.sent1: The sectile dough was ideal for making cookies.
meanings.sent2: The sectile plastic could be molded into any form.
meanings.sent3: The sectile clay behaved like a playful putty in the artist's hands.
meanings.sent4: Her sectile imagination sculpted a world of wonders.
meanings.sent5: The sectile wax melted smoothly into the desired shape.
